name: Temple of Heaven
description: An imperial complex of religious buildings situated in the southeastern part of central Beijing.

name: Hagia Sophia
description: A former Greek Orthodox Christian basilica, later an imperial mosque and now a museum.

name: Kinkaku-ji
description: A Zen Buddhist temple in Kyoto whose top two floors are completely covered in gold leaf.

name: St. Peter's Basilica
description: An Italian Renaissance church in Vatican City, the papal enclave within the city of Rome.

name: Angkor Wat
description: A temple complex in Cambodia and the largest religious monument in the world.
